group_1.textRight: Please give me one more chance.

group_1.textLeft: Have you figured out what you lack?
What do you want to do?

group_1.textRight: Do you remember the three masters I served@on my first day as a maid?

group_1.textLeft: Of course. You made one of them faint,@didn't you?

group_1.textRight: I'd like to serve them again.
They left here disappointed in their maid@cafe experience.
I want to make things right.

group_1.textLeft: But what if they don't want to come back?

group_1.textRight: Don't worry about that. They're my neighbors.

group_1.textLeft: Oh, I didn't know you were friends.

group_1.textRight: We're not. I've just seen them around before,@that's all. Our complex is pretty big.
I'd like to invite them here, if they're@willing to agree to it.
Will you give me one more chance?
I want to show them that a maid cafe can@be fun.

group_1.textLeft: All right... But just this once.
